subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Hunter Mahan rallied to win at 12 under par. Phil Mickelson, who needed to finish fourth or better to surpass Tiger Woods for the No. 1 ranking, finished tied for 46th.
snippet: Hunter Mahan rallied to win at 12 under par. Phil Mickelson, who needed to finish fourth or better to surpass Tiger Woods for the No. 1 ranking, finished tied for 46th.
